hint.en: Activates predicted cost notification and triggers the flow card 'Predicted cost notification trigged' if the predicted cost exceeds the limit set in the setting 'Prediction cost limit (kr)'.
hint.no: Aktiverer estimert kostnadsvarsel og trigger flow-kortet 'Estimert kostnadsvarsel trigget' dersom estimert forbruk overstiger grensen satt i innstillingen 'Estimert kostnadsgrense (kr)'.
